DOC.brief_summary: This clinical study plan determine effectiveness special laser treatment intend correct near distance vision patient undergo previous cataract surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Presbyopic Supracor Treatment Near Myopic/Hyperopic Pseudophakic Eyes
DOC.detailed_description: This clinical study plan evaluate safety effectiveness SUPRACOR presbyopic excimer laser treatment algorithm near myopic near hyperopic indication , without astigmatism , perform cornea pseudophakic eye implant monofocal IOL .
DOC.criteria: Subjects must least 45 year old Subjects must read , understand , sign Informed Consent Form ( ICF ) . Subjects must willing able return schedule followup examination 6 month surgery . Subjects must undergone previous uncomplicated cataract surgery monofocal IOL implant study eye least 3 month prior study enrollment . Subjects must +/ 2.0 ( D ) absolute spherical myopia hyperopia ( spherical equivalent ) , +/ 2.0 D refractive astigmatism ( NOT corneal astigmatism ) manifest subjective refraction . The spherical equivalent must +/ 2.0 D. Subjects screen successfully acceptance SUPRACOR simulation Subjects combination baseline corneal thickness plan operative parameter LASIK procedure would result less 250 micron remain corneal thickness flap postoperatively . Subjects preoperative assessment ocular topography indicate one eye suitable candidate treatment base upon suggest computersimulated treatment plan ( e.G . Keratoconus ) .
